title: Water Supply Maintenance
message: Water supply will be temporarily interrupted on February 25th from 9 AM to 3 PM for maintenance work. Please store water in advance.

title: Parking Regulations Reminder
message: Please ensure your vehicles are parked in designated areas only. Unauthorized parking may result in fines.

title: New Committee Members Welcome
message: We extend a warm welcome to our newly elected committee members. They will be joining us at the next meeting.

title: Community Library Open
message: The community library is now open with extended hours. Residents can borrow books and use the reading space.
